goal.ch:
In Calculus I, we will learn:
Functions, Limits and Continuity, Derivatives, Applications of Derivatives, Integrals, Applications of Definite Integrals
goal.en:
In Calculus I, we will learn:
Functions, Limits and Continuity, Derivatives, Applications of Derivatives, Integrals, Applications of Definite Integrals

outline.ch:
In Calculus I, I plan to teach the following sections in the textbook:
1.1~1.3
2.1~2.6
3.1~3.3 ＆ 3.5~3.9
4.1~4.5 ＆ 4.7
5.1~5.6
6.1~6.2
outline.en:
In Calculus I, I plan to teach the following sections in the textbook:
1.1~1.3
2.1~2.6
3.1~3.3 ＆ 3.5~3.9
4.1~4.5 ＆ 4.7
5.1~5.6
6.1~6.2

textbook.ch: Thomas‘ Calculus 14/e in SI Units, Hass.
textbook.en: Thomas‘ Calculus 14/e in SI Units, Hass.

gradMethod.ch:
1. 平時考試/上課出席 30％
2. 兩次期中考試: 各佔 25％   
3. 一次期末: 佔30％
gradMethod.en:
1. quizzes/attendance: 30％
2. two midterm exams: per 25％   
3. one final exam: 30％

flexDiscription.ch:
Please self-study the sections among Chapters 1-6 which the 
lecturer will not teach in the class. Additionally, please implement the numerical methods learning from the class.
flexDiscription.en:
Please self-study the sections among Chapters 1-6 which the 
lecturer will not teach in the class. Additionally, please implement the numerical methods learning from the class.
